Forms

Text Input

HTML
<label for="textInput" class="standard-label">Text input 1</label>
<input type="text" id="textInput" placeholder="placeholder text" />

<label for="textInput" class="standard-label">Text input 2</label>
<input type="text" id="textInput" placeholder="placeholder text" value="filled out field value" />

<label for="textInput" class="standard-label">Disabled text input</label>
<input type="text" id="textInput" value="placeholder text" disabled="disabled" />

Select

HTML
<label for="normal-select" class="standard-label">Normal Select</label>
<div class="selectdiv">
	<select id="normal-select">
		<option value="">Option 1</option>
		<option value="">Option 2</option>
		<option value="">Option 3</option>
		<option value="">Option 4</option>
		<option value="">Option 5</option>
	</select>
</div>

<label for="disabled-select" class="standard-label">Disabled Select</label>
<div class="selectdiv">
	<select id="disabled-select" disabled="disabled">
		<option value="">Option 1</option>
		<option value="">Option 2</option>
		<option value="">Option 3</option>
		<option value="">Option 4</option>
		<option value="">Option 5</option>
	</select>
</div>

Textarea

HTML
<label for="normal-textarea" class="standard-label">Normal Textarea</label>
<textarea name="" id="normal-textarea" cols="30" rows="10"></textarea>

<label for="disabled-textarea" class="standard-label">Disabled Textarea</label>
<textarea name="" id="disabled-textarea" cols="30" rows="10" disabled="disabled">Disabled Textarea</textarea>

Checkbox

HTML
<label class="control control--checkbox">First checkbox
	<input type="checkbox" name="checkbox" checked="checked" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--checkbox">Second checkbox
	<input type="checkbox" name="checkbox" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--checkbox">Disabled
	<input type="checkbox" name="checkbox2" disabled="disabled" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--checkbox">Disabled & checked
	<input type="checkbox" name="checkbox2" disabled="disabled" checked="checked" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

Toggle Switch

Off On
Off On
Off On
HTML
<div class="toggle-switch">
	<span class="toggle-off">Off</span>
	<input type="checkbox" id="toggle1" class="checkbox" />
	<label for="toggle1" class="switch"></label>
	<span class="toggle-on">On</span>
</div>

<div class="toggle-switch">
	<span class="toggle-off">Off</span>
	<input type="checkbox" id="toggle2" class="checkbox" checked />
	<label for="toggle2" class="switch"></label>
	<span class="toggle-on">On</span>
</div>

<div class="toggle-switch">
	<span class="toggle-off">Off</span>
	<input type="checkbox" id="toggle3" class="checkbox" disabled />
	<label for="toggle3" class="switch"></label>
	<span class="toggle-on">On</span>
</div>

Radio

HTML
<label class="control control--radio">First radio
	<input type="radio" name="radio" checked="checked" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--radio">Second radio
	<input type="radio" name="radio" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--radio">Disabled
	<input type="radio" name="radio2" disabled="disabled" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

<label class="control control--radio">Disabled & checked
	<input type="radio" name="radio2" disabled="disabled" checked="checked" />
	<div class="control__indicator"></div>
</label>

Validation

Error message here

Error message here

Error message here

HTML
<label for="textInput">Text input with error</label>
<input type="text" id="textInput" placeholder="invalid value" required />
<p class="form-hint">Error message here</p>


<div class="selectdiv">
	<label>
		<select required>
			<option value="" disabled selected>Select an Option</option>
			<option value="1">Option 1</option>
			<option value="2">Option 2</option>
			<option value="3">Option 3</option>
			<option value="4">Option 4</option>
			<option value="5">Option 5</option>
		</select>
	</label>
</div>
<p class="form-hint">Error message here</p>


<textarea name="" id="" cols="30" rows="10" required></textarea>
<p class="form-hint">Error message here</p>
